name: Alien Quest: Eve
description:
This is a Metroidvania-style game that inspired of A*ien movie series.
When you level up you get stat points. It makes the heroine stronger.
Also, you can get 5 Augment items, 5 ability items, and lots of bonus items.

Explore the space ship and find hidden bonus items.

  • Metroidvania style game
  • 41 Enemies
  • 48 Animations
  • 5 GameOver CG
  • Xbox controller support
